class pyrimidine.benchmarks.cluster.KMeans(X, n_components=2)¶

Bases: object

KMeans clustering Problem

min J(c,mu)=sum_i ||xi-mu_ci|| where xi in ci

class pyrimidine.benchmarks.optimization.Knapsack(w, c, W=0.7, M=100)¶

Bases: object

Knapsack Problem

max sum_i ci s.t. sum_i wi <= W where ci, wi selected from c, w

argsort()¶
static example(W=0.7)¶

Module contents¶

class pyrimidine.benchmarks.BaseProblem¶

Bases: object

Base Class of Problems

The class is just a function (callable object). Please implement __call__ method in each subclass make it behaving as function

In fact, it is never used, just a template.
